product_name: The North Face TKA 100 Microvelour Glacier Quarter-Zip Pullover - Men's
long_description: The North Face TKA 100 Microvelour Glacier Quarter-Zip pullover has an unparalleled soft hand and impressive efficiencies over the original TKA microfleece fabric. Updated Polartec(R) TKA 100 microfleece provides 10% more warmth and 50% more thermal efficiency than the original TKA 100 at 27% less weight. It's also 24% more breathable and 18% more compressible, giving way to 23 cu. in. of pack space savings. TKA 100 Microvelour Glacier Quarter-Zip provides warmth without the weight and bulkiness of traditional insulating fabrics and is highly breathable for comfort during activity. Pill-resistant top dries quickly to minimize heat loss. Fabric provides UPF 30 protection from harmful solar rays. Tall neck zips up for warmth or down for venting.
short_description: The North Face TKA 100 Microvelour Glacier Quarter-Zip pullover has an unparalleled soft hand and impressive efficiencies over the original TKA microfleece fabric.
